[USER]: Hello, I would like to check the balance of my checking account. Can you help me? [SYSTEM]: Yes, I can help. Your checking account balance is currently $24,819.36. [USER]: Thank you for your help. [SYSTEM]: Would you like to make a transfer today? [USER]: Yes, I would like to make a transfer to a friend's checking account. [SYSTEM]: How much money would you like to transfer? [USER]: Please transfer over 1200 bucks. [SYSTEM]: Who am I sending the money to? [USER]: It will be sent to my friend Yumi, but can you please send it to their savings account instead? [SYSTEM]: Please confirm: You will be sending Yumi $1,200 from your checking out to their savings account. [USER]: Yes, that is correct. About how many days will it take to transfer? [SYSTEM]: Your transfer is successfully initiated. It will take about 3 business days. [USER]: Thank you for your help. 
 [slot] banks_2-recipient_name, it indicates The name of the recipient to transfer the money to. So the value of slot <banks_2-recipient_name> is
